outline:
1. to neigh, cry shrilly
    1. (Qal)
      1. to neigh (of men as stallions - fig.)
      2. (Piel) to cry shrilly (in distress)
    2. (Hiphil) to make shining
kjv_def: bellow, cry aloud (out), lift up, neigh, rejoice, make to shine, shout.
strongs_def: to gleam, i.e. (figuratively) be cheerful; by transference to sound clear (of various animal or human expressions)
